text.name: info3
text.text: CPU: Hitachi SH-4 32-bit RISC CPU 200 MHz

text.name: info9
text.text: The Atomiswave is a custom arcade system board and cabinet from

text.name: info10
text.text: Sammy Corporation, based on Sega's NAOMI system board. It uses

text.name: info11
text.text: game cartridges and the control panel can be easily switched out
